TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Domain extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryPartition

summary.span: 类表示 Active Directory 域。

span.span: The class represents an Active Directory domain.
How To: Work with Trusts

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Children As DomainCollection

summary.span: 获取此域的子域。

span.span: Gets the domains that are children of this domain.
An object that contains the child domains.
The object has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (string targetDomainName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword);

.method public hidebysig instance void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(string targetDomainName, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword) cil managed
Public Sub CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (targetDomainName As String, direction As TrustDirection, trustPassword As String)
public: void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(System::String ^ targetDomainName, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::TrustDirection direction, System::String ^ trustPassword);

param.name: targetDomainName
param.span: 与其创建信任关系的域的 DNS 名称。

span.span: The DNS name of the domain that the trust is created with.

param.name: direction
param.span: 确定相对于此域的信任方向的 成员之一。

span.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.

param.name: trustPassword
param.span: 信任的密码。

span.span: The password for the trust.

summary.span: 创建与指定域存在信任关系的本地方。

span.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建信任关系的一方。This method creates one side of a trust relationship. 只有在创建信任的双方后，才会建立信任。The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created. `trustPassword`参数将密码与创建的信任相关联。The `trustPassword` parameter associates a password with the created trust. 当创建信任的另一方时，将提供相同的密码，然后将两个本地信任相互绑定。When the other side of the trust is created, the same password is provided and the two local trusts are then bound to each other. 若要以编程方式在单个方法调用中创建信任关系的双方，请使用 方法。To programmatically create both sides of a trust relationship in a single method call, use the method.

span.span: The trust relationship already exists.

exception.span: 对基础目录服务的调用导致了错误。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: 目标服务器忙或不可用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
or is empty.
or is .
is not a valid value.
The object has been disposed.

exception.span: 指定的帐户没有权限执行此操作。

span.span: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
How To: Work with Trusts

summary.span: 使用指定的域创建信任关系的双方。

span.span: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用单个方法调用创建信任关系的双方。This method creates both sides of a trust relationship with a single method call. 方法用于仅创建信任的一方。The method is used to create only one side of a trust.

span.span: The trust relationship already exists.

summary.span: 删除信任关系的本地方。

span.span: Deletes the local side of a trust relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 删除信任关系的一方时，该信任会变长。When one side of a trust relationship is deleted, the trust longer exists. 若要通过一个方法调用删除信任关系的双方，请使用 方法。To delete both sides of a trust relationship with one method call, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers() cil managed

summary.span: 查找此域中的所有可发现域控制器。

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含由此方法找到的域控制器对象。

span.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过查询 DNS SRV 记录找到可发现的域控制器。You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. 此方法仅返回那些注册了一般的非特定于站点的域控制器 SRV 记录的域控制器。Only those domain controllers that register the generic, non-site-specific, domain controller SRV record will be returned by this method.

exception.span: 目标服务器忙或不可用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The object has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers(string siteName) cil managed
Public Function FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers (siteName As String) As DomainControllerCollection

param.name: siteName
param.span: 从中搜索域控制器的站点名称。

span.span: The name of the site to search for the domain controllers.

summary.span: 查找此域中的所有可发现域控制器，它们也在指定的站点中。

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain that are also in the specified site.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含由此方法找到的域控制器对象。

span.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过查询 DNS SRV 记录找到可发现的域控制器。You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. 如果域控制器未为指定站点注册 SRV 记录，则此方法不会返回该记录，即使域控制器在物理位置位于该站点中。If a domain controller does not register an SRV record for the specified site, it will not be returned by this method, even if the domain controller is physically located within that site. 此方法将返回注册指定站点的 SRV 记录的所有域控制器，即使它们不在该站点内的物理位置。All domain controllers that register an SRV record for the specified site will be returned by this method, even if they are not physically located within that site.

exception.span: 目标服务器忙或不可用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
is an empty string.
is .
The object has been disposed.

summary.span: 查找此域中的所有域控制器。

span.span: Finds all of the domain controllers in this domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在域中查找任何域控制器。This method finds any domain controller in the domain. 不能保证此方法的另一次调用会找到同一域控制器。There is no guarantee that the same domain controller will be found by another call to this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain GetComputerDomain() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetComputerDomain () As Domain

summary.span: 获取表示本地计算机所加入的域的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the domain to which the local computer is joined.

returns.span: 表示本地计算机所加入的域的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents the domain to which the local machine is joined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的返回值 是一个对象，该 对象表示运行应用程序的计算机所联接到的域。The return value of the method is a object representing the domain to which the computer running the application is joined. 此返回值与运行应用程序时所用的域凭据无关。This return value is independent of the domain credentials under which the application is run. 此方法将检索计算机的域，而不考虑在其下运行的受信任帐户域凭据。This method will retrieve the computer's domain regardless of the trusted account domain credentials it is run under. 若要检索 对象，该对象表示与运行应用程序的安全上下文有效的用户凭据对应的域，请改用 方法。To retrieve the object that represents the domain corresponding to the user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running, use the method instead.

span.span: A connection to the domain could not be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain GetCurrentDomain() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCurrentDomain () As Domain

summary.span: 获取当前的有效用户凭据的 对象，该凭据适用于应用程序在其中运行的安全性上下文。

span.span: Gets the object for the current user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

returns.span: 表示指定的有效用户凭据的域的 对象，该凭据适用于应用程序在其中运行的安全性上下文。

span.span: A object that represents the domain for the specified user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由运行应用程序时所用的域凭据决定。 method is determined by the domain credentials under which the application is running. 若要检索 表示运行应用程序的计算机加入的域的对象，而不考虑与该应用程序关联的凭据，请改用 方法。To retrieve the object representing the domain to which the computer running the application is joined, regardless of the credentials associated with that application, use the method instead. ## 另请参阅See Also

exception.span: 无法连接到当前上下文。

span.span: A connection to the current context could not be made.

The object has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseDomainFunctionality(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode domainMode) cil managed

param.name: domainMode
param.span: 一个 枚举值，该值指定域的新操作级别。

span.span: An enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the domain.

summary.span: 为域提升操作模式。

span.span: Raises the mode of operation for the domain.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 值可以引发但不会降低。The value can be raised but not lowered. 这意味着提高域的功能级别是不可逆的，并且应谨慎地做出此决定。This means that raising the functionality level of the domain is not reversible and the decision to do this should be made carefully. 有关域操作模式的详细信息，请参阅[域和林功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/it-pro/windows-server-2008-r2-and-2008/dd894353(v%3dws.11))。For more information about domain operational modes, see [Domain and forest functionality](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/it-pro/windows-server-2008-r2-and-2008/dd894353(v%3dws.11)). 下表根据 `domainMode` 域的当前运行模式定义的有效值。The following table defines the valid values for `domainMode` based on the current operating mode of the domain. |当前模式Current mode|模式可提升到Mode can be raised to| |------------------|---------------------------| ||



| ||| ||| ||NoneNone|

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

exception.span: 基于域的当前操作模式，为 指定的值无效。

span.span: Based on the current operating mode of the domain, the value specified for is not valid.

exception.span: 不是有效的 枚举值。

span.span: is not a valid enumeration value.
The object has been disposed.

exception.span: 指定的帐户没有权限执行此操作。

span.span: Repairs a trust relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通过重置信任的安全通道来修复信任。This method repairs the trust by resetting the secure channel for the trust. 如果操作未能重置安全通道，它也会重置信任密码。If the operation fails to reset the secure channel, then it will also reset the trust password.

span.span: The target or source server is either busy or unavailable.
is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VerifyOutboundTrustRelationship(string targetDomainName) cil managed

param.name: targetDomainName
param.span: 与其存在信任的域的 DNS 名称。

span.span: The DNS name of the domain with which the trust exists.

summary.span: 验证以前建立的与指定域的出站信任关系是否有效。

span.span: Verifies that a previously established outbound trust with the specified domain is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于验证是否已完全建立了信任关系。This method is used to verify that a trust relationship has been fully established. 只有在创建信任的双方后，才会建立信任。The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.

exception.span: 与 指定的域没有任何出站信任关系。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VerifyTrustRelationship(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain targetDomain, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction) cil managed
Public Sub VerifyTrustRelationship (targetDomain As Domain, direction As TrustDirection)

param.name: targetDomain
param.span: 一个 对象，表示与其存在信任关系的域。

span.span: A object that represents the domain with which the trust exists.

param.name: direction
param.span: 一个 值，指定信任关系相对于此域的方向。

span.span: A value that specifies the direction, relative to this domain, of the trust.

summary.span: 验证以前建立的与指定域的信任关系是否有效。

span.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified domain is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证是否已完全建立了信任关系。This method verifies that a trust relationship has been fully established. 只有在创建信任的双方后，才会建立信任。The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.

exception.span: 与 参数指定的域没有信任关系，或者目标域没有 参数指定的信任方向。

span.span: There is no trust relationship with the domain that is specified by the parameter, or the target domain does not have the trust direction that is specified by the parameter.
